statements.statement: select max(SampleNum) from SampleTb where CreateTime between #starttime# and #endtime#
select * from SampleTb where CreateTime between #starttime# and #endtime# ORDER BY SampleNum
select count(*) from SampleTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and PanelNum = #PanelNum# and CreateTime between #starttime# and #endtime#

insert into SampleTb (SampleNum, CreateTime, SampleState, SamContainer, SampleType, Barcode, PanelNum, SamplePos, IsOperateDilution, IsEmergency, IsPrinted, IsSend) values(#SampleNum#, #CreateTime#, #SampleState#, #SamContainer#, #SampleType#, #Barcode#, #PanelNum#, #SamplePos#, #IsOperateDilution#, #IsEmergency#, #IsPrinted#, #IsSend#)

insert into TaskTb (SampleNum, CreateDate, ProjectName, SampleType, SampleDilute, DilutedRatio, InspectTimes, SendTimes, FinishTimes, TaskState) values(#SampleNum#, #CreateDate#, #ProjectName#, #SampleType#, #SampleDilute#, #DilutedRatio#, #InspectTimes#, #SendTimes#, #FinishTimes#, #TaskState#)
insert into PatientInfoTb (SampleNum, InputTime) values (#SampleNum#, #InputTime#)
select * from PatientInfoTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and InputTime between #starttime# and #endtime#
select count(*) from PatientInfoTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and InputTime between #starttime# and #endtime#

update PatientInfoTb set InputTime=#InputTime#, SampleID=#SampleID#, PatientName=#PatientName#, BirthDate=#BirthDate#, Age=#Age#, Sex=#Sex#, PatientType=#PatientType#, InspectTime=#InspectTime#, BedNum=#BedNum#, ApplyDepartment=#ApplyDepartment#, ApplyDoctor=#ApplyDoctor#, AuditDoctor=#AuditDoctor#, InspectDoctor=#InspectDoctor#, SamplingTime=#SamplingTime#, ApplyTime=#ApplyTime#, ClinicalDiagnosis=#ClinicalDiagnosis#, Remarks=#Remarks# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ApplyTime=#ApplyTime#

insert into PatientInfoTb (SampleNum, InputTime, SampleID, PatientName, BirthDate, Age, Sex, PatientType, InspectTime, BedNum, ApplyDepartment, ApplyDoctor, AuditDoctor, InspectDoctor, SamplingTime, ApplyTime, ClinicalDiagnosis, Remarks) values (#SampleNum#, #InputTime#, #SampleID#, #PatientName#, #BirthDate#, #Age#, #Sex#, #PatientType#, #InspectTime#, #BedNum#, #ApplyDepartment#, #ApplyDoctor#, #AuditDoctor#, #InspectDoctor#, #SamplingTime#, #ApplyTime#, #ClinicalDiagnosis#, #Remarks#)
select * from PatientInfoTb where InputTime between #starttime# and #endtime#
update SampleTb set SampleState=#SampleState# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateTime=#CreateTime#
select * from TaskTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateDate=#ApplyTime# and ProjectName=#ProjectName#
select * from TaskTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateDate between #starttime# and #endtime#
select count(*) from SDTTableItemTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType#
select * from SampleTb where PanelNum=#PanelNum# and SamplePos=#SamplePos# and CreateTime between #starttime# and #endtime#
select * from SampleTb where PanelNum=#PanelNum# and CreateTime between #starttime# and #endtime#
select * from SampleTb where CreateTime=#sampleCreateTime# and SampleNum=#sampleNum#
select SampleDilute from TaskTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateDate=#SampleCreateTime# and ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType#

update SampleResultTb set AbsValue=#AbsValue#, ConcResult=#ConcResult#, SampleCompletionTime=#SampleCompletionTime#, SampleCompletionStatus=#SampleCompletionStatus# where TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime=#SampleCreateTime#
update TaskTb set TaskState='0' where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and InspectTimes>SendTimes
update SampleResultTb set Remarks=#Remarks# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ProjectName=#ProjectName# and TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime=#SampleCreateTime#
select * from TaskTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateDate between #StartTime# and #EndTime#

select top $count$ t1.* from TaskTb t1,SampleTb s,AssayProjectParamInfoTb a,projectrunsequencetb run,ReagentStateinfor1r2tb r1r2 where t1.SampleNum = s.SampleNum and t1.ProjectName = a.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = a.SampleType and s.IsEmergency = '1' and (t1.ProjectName = r1r2.ProjectName and r1r2.Locked = 'false') and t1.ProjectName = run.ProjectName and t1.TaskState = 0 and s.PanelNum = #disk# order by t1.SampleNum, run.RunSequence

select top $count$ t1.* from TaskTb t1,SampleTb s,AssayProjectParamInfoTb a,projectrunsequencetb run,ReagentStateinfor1r2tb r1r2 where t1.SampleNum = s.SampleNum and t1.ProjectName = a.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = a.SampleType and s.IsEmergency = '0' and (t1.ProjectName = r1r2.ProjectName and r1r2.Locked = 'false') and t1.ProjectName = run.ProjectName and t1.TaskState = 0 and s.PanelNum = #disk# order by t1.SampleNum, run.RunSequence
select * from SampleTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateTime between #CreateTimeStart# and #CreateTimeEnd#
update RunningStateTb set WorkDisk = #value#
$value$
$value$
